1.0.name: wordpress/bitly
1.0.description:
With our new WordPress plug-in you can automatically create Bitly links for new posts and have those short links pushed to your pre-existing social sharing tools. Additionally, you can show a Bitly sidebar widget that displays your most popular or most recent bitmarks OR displays the top results from the bitly universe for a search term of your choosing.

This plugin uses the Bitly API (http://dev.bitly.com) all links are stored in WordPress and with Bitly.
